short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage your logins, and autofill forms while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SubOne simplifies your online experience. Trusted by millions worldwide, SubOne safeguards your passwords and streamlines internet tasks.

With the SubOne extension, easily manage your logins, and auto-fill forms while browsing. Access the full potential of SubOne in the web app to securely share passwords and maintain your Passwords.

Key features:

- Log in across all devices
- Store unlimited logins in your account
- Auto-fill logins on every website
- Seamless synchronization between devices

Create and save strong passwords on the go:
- Automatically save logins as you browse
- Effortlessly update and replace logins

Streamline payments and personal info:
- Auto-fill personal information
- Speed through checkout and important forms
- Securely store sensitive data with bank-grade encryption

Your privacy is paramount:
- SubOne uses bank-grade encryption to protect your passwords
- We follow a zero-knowledge security model, ensuring your data remains confidential

With SubOne, your logins are secure, private, and easily accessible for you alone.
